item.title: 艾伯维上调年度盈利预期，因新型免疫学药物需求强劲
item.description: 艾伯维周五上调了 2025 年的利润预期，此前较新的免疫学药物 Skyrizi 和 Rinvoq 的销售强劲，使第三季度业绩高于华尔街预期。【原文：AbbVie raised its 2025 profit forecast on Friday, after strong sales of newer immunology drugs Skyrizi and Rinvoq helped boost third-quarter results above Wall Street estimates.】

item.title: 竞争白热化，Charter 宽带用户流失超预期
item.description: Charter Communications 周五报告称，该公司第三季度宽带用户下降幅度超过预期，因为这家美国宽带和有线电视服务提供商正在努力应对来自无线运营商的激烈竞争。【原文：Charter Communications reported a larger-than-expected decline in broadband subscribers for the third quarter on Friday, as the U.S. broadband and cable TV provider grapples with intense competition from wireless carriers.】

item.title: 数据存储公司西部数据和希捷因人工智能驱动的需求激增而飙升
item.description: 希捷（Seagate）和西部数据（Western Digital）等数据存储公司的股价今年大幅跑赢大盘，原因是全球竞相扩大人工智能相关基础设施的规模，对硬盘的需求惊人。【原文：Shares of data storage companies such as Seagate and Western Digital have sharply outperformed the broader market this year, powered by the staggering demand for hard drives in the global race to scale up AI-related infrastructure.】

item.title: 风险管理需求强劲，保险经纪公司 Aon 盈利超出预期
item.description: 周五，保险经纪公司 Aon 的第三季度利润超出华尔街预期，原因是市场对其风险管理解决方案的需求强劲。【原文：Insurance brokerage firm Aon beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter profit on Friday, amid robust demand for its risk-management solutions.】

item.title: 尽管存在地缘政治风险，但供应充足、需求低迷将抑制油价
item.description: 路透社周五的一项民意调查显示，由于欧佩克+产量目标的提高和需求不振抵消了供应方面的地缘政治风险，分析师们对油价的预测基本保持不变。【原文：Analysts are holding their oil price forecasts largely unchanged as rising OPEC+ output targets and lacklustre demand offset geopolitical risks to supply, a Reuters poll showed on Friday.】

item.title: 美国议员要求特朗普政府帮助马来西亚打击芯片走私
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一封信，一名美国共和党参议员要求美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的政府帮助马来西亚政府防止美国人工智能芯片通过该国走私到中国。【原文：A U.S. Republican senator is asking U.S. President Donald Trump's administration to help the Malaysian government prevent U.S. artificial intelligence chips from being smuggled through the country to China, according to a letter seen by Reuters.】

item.title: iPhone 假期销售预期缓解供应困境，苹果股价上涨
item.description: 周五，苹果公司股价盘前上涨约 2%，原因是对利润丰厚的假日季度的乐观预测显示，尽管向关键市场中国发货出现延误，但最新的 iPhone 17 机型推动了销售反弹。【原文：Apple shares rose about 2% premarket on Friday after upbeat forecasts for the lucrative holiday quarter suggested the latest iPhone 17 models were driving a sales rebound despite delays in shipping to key market China.】

item.title: 日产与巨石公司扩大人工智能合作，以缩短汽车开发时间
item.description: 日产汽车公司和英国软件公司Monolith周五表示，他们已扩大合作，利用人工智能减少汽车物理测试，因为日本汽车制造商正努力缩短新车的开发时间。【原文：Nissan and UK software firm Monolith said on Friday they have extended their partnership using artificial intelligence to reduce vehicle physical testing as the Japanese automaker pushes to slash development times for new cars.】

item.title: 埃克森公司第三季度利润超出预期，原因是圭亚那和二叠纪产量增加
item.description: 埃克森美孚周五公布的第三季度盈利超出华尔街预期，主要得益于圭亚那和二叠纪盆地石油和天然气产量增加，抵消了油价下跌的影响。【原文：Exxon Mobil beat Wall Street estimates for third-quarter earnings on Friday, underpinned by higher oil and gas production in Guyana and the Permian Basin, which offset lower oil prices.】

item.title: 台湾联发科目标到 2027 年人工智能加速芯片收入达数十亿美元
item.description: 台湾顶级芯片设计公司联发科技（MediaTek）首席执行官周五表示，随着该公司进一步推进数据中心业务，预计到2027年，其人工智能加速器ASIC芯片将带来数十亿美元的收入。【原文：Taiwan's top chip design company, MediaTek , expects to earn revenue of billions of dollars from its AI accelerator ASIC chips by 2027, the chief executive said on Friday, as the company pushes further into the data centre business.】

item.title: 雪佛龙第三季度盈利超出预期，赫斯交易后产量创历史新高
item.description: 周五，雪佛龙公司的业绩超过了分析师的预期，创纪录的石油和天然气产量、550亿美元收购赫斯公司（Hess）所带来的推动力以及炼油利润率的增长，都提升了这家美国第二大石油生产商第三季度的业绩。【原文：Chevron beat analyst estimates on Friday as record oil and gas production, boosted by its $55 billion acquisition of Hess, and stronger refining margins lifted the No. 2 U.S. oil producer's results for the third quarter.】

item.title: 华尔街一周前瞻 在人工智能和美联储动荡之后，股市反弹面临盈利浪潮
item.description: 美国股市的反弹势头在进入繁忙的企业财报周后有所恢复，但投资者对人工智能交易的力度以及美联储降息的力度感到担忧。【原文：A resilient U.S. stocks rally heads into a busy week of corporate results, with investors concerned about the strength of the artificial intelligence trade and about how aggressively the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates.】

item.title: 凯雷第三季度收费相关盈利大幅增长，资产规模达 4,740 亿美元
item.description: 资产管理公司凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）周五报告称，第三季度与费用相关的收益和资金流入均有所增长，达到 170 亿美元，并表示预计全年业绩将超过其财务目标。【原文：Asset manager Carlyle Group on Friday reported a rise in fee-related earnings and inflows of $17 billion for the third quarter, and said it expected to beat its financial targets for the full year.】

item.title: 竞争对手上市重塑格局，Coinbase 仍在美国加密货币竞争中保持优势
item.description: 华尔街分析师周五表示，作为唯一上市交易的加密货币交易所，Coinbase 的先发优势使其盈利再次超过预期，但来自更明确的规则和新上市公司的竞争迫在眉睫。【原文：Coinbase's first-mover advantage as the only publicly traded crypto exchange helped it top earnings estimates again, but competition is looming from clearer rules and newly listed companies, Wall Street analysts said on Friday.】

item.title: 人工智能大发展没有放缓的迹象
item.description: 科技领域重要的一周表明，尽管存在泡沫言论，但没有迹象表明人工智能基础设施建设的热潮正在放缓。【原文：A momentous week in the technology sector made it clear there is no sign the boom in building artificial intelligence infrastructure is slowing — despite the bubble talk.】

item.title: 特朗普大力推动核反应堆建设引发安全担忧
item.description: 特朗普政府本周早些时候宣布的一项巨额核协议为美国政府提供了数十亿美元的奖励，用于发放新西屋反应堆的许可证和审批--批评人士称，这种前所未有的结构会带来环境和安全风险。【原文：A huge nuclear deal announced by the Trump administration earlier this week provides a multi-billion-dollar incentive for the U.S. government to issue permits and approvals for new Westinghouse reactors - an unprecedented structure that critics say poses environmental and safety risks.】

item.title: 食品援助即将失效，美国食品杂货商为销售下滑做好准备
item.description: 从沃尔玛到史密斯菲尔德食品公司（Smithfield Foods）等美国食品杂货商和食品公司都在做好准备，如果联邦食品援助福利因政府停摆而首次失效，11 月份的销售额将出现下滑。【原文：U.S. grocers and food companies ranging from Walmart to Smithfield Foods are bracing for a dip in November sales if federal food aid benefits lapse for the first time due to the ongoing government shutdown.】

item.title: 诺和诺德首席执行官表示，影响 9000 名员工的裁员工作已基本完成
item.description: 诺和诺德公司首席执行官迈克-杜斯塔尔（Mike Doustdar）周五在 LinkedIn 上发表文章称，诺和诺德公司已经通知了受该公司裁员影响的绝大多数地区的员工，尽管裁员的速度因当地法律而异。【原文：Novo Nordisk has notified employees impacted by the drugmaker's job cuts in the vast majority of its locations although the pace varies according to local laws, its CEO Mike Doustdar wrote in a post on LinkedIn on Friday.】

item.title: 辉瑞公司在竞购美特斯邦威时可能持有特朗普牌
item.description: 分析师、投资者和律师周四表示，美国制药商辉瑞可能会利用其在唐纳德-特朗普总统政府中的关系，试图挫败诺和诺德收购美国肥胖症生物技术公司Metsera的出人意料的竞争对手竞购。【原文：U.S. drugmaker Pfizer could work its connections within President Donald Trump's administration to try to thwart Novo Nordisk's surprise rival bid to acquire U.S. obesity biotech firm Metsera, analysts, investors and lawyers said on Thursday.】

item.title: 华尔街对马姆达尼出任市长心存疑虑，但已做好合作准备
item.description: 华尔街和金融业对领跑者佐赫兰-马姆达尼（Zohran Mamdani）成为纽约市市长的前景普遍心存疑虑，但许多人希望他能缓和立场，准备尝试与他并肩工作。【原文：Wall Street and the finance industry have broad misgivings about the prospect of frontrunner Zohran Mamdani becoming New York City's mayor, but many are hopeful he moderates his positions as they prepare to try and work alongside him.】

item.title: 洞察力：人工智能让谷歌云从 "不入流 "变为 Alphabet 的增长动力
item.description: 谷歌云曾是一个亏损的穷乡僻壤，但凭借在人工智能上的巨大赌注，以及多年来在数据中心、定制芯片和网络设备上的高成本投资，谷歌云已成为 Alphabet 发展最快的业务之一。【原文：Once a money-losing backwater, Google Cloud has become one of Alphabet's fastest-growing businesses, powered by massive bets on AI and years of costly investment in datacenters, custom chips, and networking gear.】

item.title: 亚太经合组织官员称成员国正努力就贸易问题达成共识
item.description: 亚太经济合作组织（APEC）秘书处的一位高级官员表示，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税给该论坛的年度峰会蒙上阴影之际，大多数亚太国家希望并正在朝着自由开放的贸易方向发展。【原文：Most Asia-Pacific countries want and are heading in the direction of free and open trade, a senior official at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) secretariat said, as U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs overshadowed the forum's annual summit.】

item.title: 印度 Happiest Minds 公司认为 GenAI 将在三年内达到两位数的收入份额
item.description: Happiest Minds Technologies 公司的高层管理人员告诉路透社记者，随着客户加快人工智能支出以削减成本和提高生产力，该公司预计其生成式人工智能业务的收入份额将在三年内达到两位数，高于 2025 财年的 1.6%。【原文：Happiest Minds Technologies expects a double-digit revenue share from its generative AI business within three years, up from 1.6% in fiscal 2025, as clients accelerate AI spending to cut costs and boost productivity, its top executive told Reuters.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官希望 Blackwell 芯片能在中国销售，但决定权在特朗普手中
item.description: 英伟达公司首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）周五表示，他希望该公司最先进的 Blackwell 芯片能够在中国销售，尽管这一决定需要由美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）做出。【原文：Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang said on Friday he hoped the company's state-of-the-art Blackwell chips can be sold in China, although the decision needed to be made by U.S. President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 亚马逊股价飙升，人工智能热潮推动 AWS 云计算部门强劲增长
item.description: 亚马逊股价周五在盘前交易中大涨近 12%，此前其云部门的强劲增长和看涨的销售前景缓解了人们对这家科技巨头在人工智能竞赛中落后于竞争对手的担忧。【原文：Amazon shares jumped nearly 12% in premarket trade on Friday after strong growth at its cloud unit and a bullish sales outlook eased fears that the tech giant was falling behind rivals in the AI race.】

item.title: 对中国玩具制造商而言，贸易解冻带来稳定，但疑虑依然存在
item.description: William Ying 的公司在中国浙江省生产彩色木制玩具已有 20 年之久，对于他来说，华盛顿和中国政府之间的贸易紧张局势解冻是一个值得欢迎的迹象，他希望这能让订单再次滚动起来。【原文：For William Ying, whose company has been making colourful wooden toys in China's Zhejiang province for 20 years, a thawing of trade tensions between Washington and Beijing is a welcome sign and one he hopes will get orders rolling again.】

item.title: Pony.ai 在中国深圳获得首张全市无人驾驶商用机器人出租车许可证
item.description: 中国自动驾驶公司 Pony.ai 周五表示，该公司已获得中国南部深圳市首张全市范围的无人驾驶商用机器人出租车运营许可证。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving firm Pony.ai has been granted the first citywide permit for driverless commercial robotaxi operations in the city of Shenzhen in southern China, it said on Friday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行关键调查显示目标附近的良性通胀路径
item.description: 欧洲央行周五的一项重要调查显示，欧元区未来几年的通胀率将保持在或接近欧洲央行2%的目标，经济增长将缓慢回升至其潜力水平。【原文：Euro zone inflation will remain at or near the European Central Bank's 2% target in the coming years and growth is seen slowly picking up towards its potential, a key ECB survey showed on Friday.】

item.title: 欧洲央行调查显示：欧元区商业环境改善，人工智能蓬勃发展
item.description: 欧洲央行周五对非金融企业的调查显示，欧元区企业的经营状况略有改善，但这仍表明增长幅度不大，即使一些行业（如人工智能）正在蓬勃发展。【原文：Euro zone firms are enjoying a slight improvement in business conditions but this still points to only modest growth, even if some sectors, such as AI, are booming, the ECB's survey of non-financial companies showed on Friday.】

item.title: 苹果和亚马逊业绩预期提振市场情绪，标普和纳斯达克指数期货上涨
item.description: 周五，美国 500 指数和纳斯达克指数上涨，此前苹果公司和亚马逊公司发布了乐观的业绩预测，帮助舒缓了市场的紧张情绪。【原文：S&P 500 and Nasdaq futures gained on Friday after upbeat forecasts from Apple and Amazon helped soothe nerves a day after the indexes logged their steepest drop in more than three weeks.】
